name: The Invitation (TheDioscuri)
description:
Welcome to Spring Meadow Estate! 

You are new to a gate community. Introduce yourself to your new neighbors, and learn more about the people around you.

Features:

  • Pixel art work
  •  2,500+ word game
  • a single ending
  • under 30 minutes long
  • point and click puzzles

This is my first visual novel any critique is greatly appreciated <3

created by Castor
